Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by Baltimore in 1989...
Injured on 8/2/1990 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/22/1994 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Earned first career win on 5/22/1995...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1995, going 20-7, 2.68 ERA...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1997, going 5-1, 1.71...
Injured on 9/13/1997 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
